document_data.caption: A map of Malatra showing the site of Thok Treng.
document_data.name: Thok Treng
document_data.mainbody: '''Thok Treng''' was a town in [[Laothan]] in [[Malatra]].{{Cite interactive atlas|C2aNElc.FCW}}<ref group="note" name="name">Maps mark the settlement as "Thak Treng" though this appears to contradict the presence of the Thok clan here.
document_data.Geography: It lay on Laothan's northern coast, on the shore of the [[Eastern Sea]].
document_data.Society: This town was where the [[Thok (clan)|House of Thok]] was born—and it remained full of its supporters.
document_data.Economy: In the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]], Thok Treng enjoyed some small trade concessions, thanks to its connection to the reigning Thok clan, helping it prosper.
document_data.History: At that time, [[ninja]] in service to Prince [[Nuyen Phi]] of [[Sayan]] were assassinating certain persons who might prove problematic to his plans. They made the murders look like accidents, so the authorities were yet to grow suspicious.
